hero.title: Door‑to‑Door Sales Teams
hero.text: TDX Solution provides ethical, data‑driven outreach that turns knocks into customers — across telecom, energy, home‑service and non‑profit sectors.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: General door‑to‑door outreach scaled to your campaign goals.

items.title: Door‑to‑door sales teams
items.description: Boost conversions with TDX Solutions’ elite door-to-door sales teams. Our fully trained brand ambassadors deliver ethical, face-to-face outreach that turns knocks into customers across Toronto, Ottawa, and the GTA. From prospecting to closing, we handle every step, maximizing ROI while safeguarding your brand reputation with data-driven scripts and compliant sales practices.

items.title: Targeted regional coverage
items.description: Reach the right households at the right time. We overlay demographic, postal-code, and utility data to build laser-focused canvassing zones, ensuring hyper-local coverage throughout Southern Ontario.

items.title: Real‑time reporting and performance tracking
items.description: Stay in control! Track visits, conversions, and agent KPIs live from any device, integrate results with your CRM, and receive automated performance alerts. Transparent metrics empower you to optimize offers, adjust territories, and scale winning tactics instantly, keeping your campaign ahead of the competition.

items.title: Non‑profit Campaigns
items.description: Ethical fundraising and awareness drives that resonate at the door and build long‑term donor relationships for NGOs. Amplify your mission with TDX Solutions’ purpose-driven door-to-door fundraising teams.

process.title: How It Works
process.subtitle: A simple, repeatable framework refined over hundreds of campaigns.

steps.title: Recruit
steps.text: We hand‑pick background‑checked reps who fit your brand culture and compliance needs.

steps.title: Train
steps.text: Role‑play, product deep dives, and objection handling — all tracked via LMS.

steps.title: Deploy
steps.text: Teams roll out across Toronto & Ottawa regions with GPS check‑ins and live scripts.

steps.title: Report
steps.text: Real‑time dashboards, daily recaps, and API feeds straight to your CRM.

items.problem: Slow subscriber growth in new roll‑out zones
items.solution: TDX deployed two teams for a 6‑week blitz, tailoring the pitch to neighbourhood internet pain‑points.
items.result: +1 420 new sign‑ups (14% door‑to‑door conversion) and 96% CSAT.

items.problem: Low adoption of smart thermostats in detached homes
items.solution: Delivered a demo‑first script and QR‑code instant scheduling for installs.

about.title: Who We Are
about.text: Founded in 2019, TDX Solution has helped partners engage over 30 000 households across Toronto and Ottawa. Our mission is to build honest human connections at the doorstep while delivering real‑time, data‑rich results to our clients.
about.missionText: To empower brands and communities through respectful door‑to‑door conversations that turn neighbours into loyal customers — all backed by transparent reporting and a pay‑for‑performance ethos.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to boost your next campaign? Book a discovery call today.

footer.summary:
Ethical door‑to‑door sales partner serving Toronto & Ottawa.
30 000+ households engaged since 2019.
